title: Bitcoin Meetup Sweden
author: Bitcoin Meetup Sweden
content: Swedish Bitcoin MeetupsEvery month in several swedish cities.Just signup on the meetup page or meetup-app and join other superfriendly  swedish bitcoiners.https://www.meetup.com/swedish-bitcoin-meetups/We want to provide friendly and open Bitcoin Only events where we discuss bitcoin and its current and potential role in the global economy. If you're new to the idea, this is the place to go for educated discussions from both professionals and experienced amateurs in the space. And if you are said professional or experienced amateur, this is your opportunity to go in depth in the topic with like minded peers. We want to be the #1 place for Swedes to find and post Bitcoin Only meetups, workshops and conferences all over Sweden.
